data.name: RT302.CommandText
data.value: SELECT BATCH, DUEDATSB, DUEDATEB, DUEDATSA, DUEDATEA, CDAT, c.CUSNC, BARCODOUTDAT, g.cusnc, BARCODINDAT, i.cusnc, PRTDAT, e.CUSNC FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrt a left outer join RTEmployee b inner join RTObj c on c.cusid =b.cusid on b.emply = a.CUSR left outer join RTEmployee d inner join RTObj e on d.cusid =e.cusid on d.emply = a.PRTUSR left outer join RTEmployee f inner join RTObj g on f.cusid =g.cusid on f.emply = a.BARCODOUTUSR left outer join RTEmployee h inner join RTObj i on h.cusid =i.cusid on h.emply = a.BARCODINUSR ORDER BY BATCH DESC

data.name: RT3021.CommandText
data.value: SELECT a.comq1, a.lineq1, a.cusid, convert(varchar(6), a.COMQ1) +'-'+ convert(varchar(2), a.LINEQ1) as comqline, c.comn, a.cusnc, e.codenc, f.codenc, a.CONTACTTEL + case when a.CONTACTTEL <>'' and a.MOBILE <>'' then ' / ' else '' end + a.MOBILE as TEL, a.APPLYDAT, a.FINISHDAT, a.STRBILLINGDAT, a.newBILLINGDAT, a.adjustday, a.DUEDAT, a.DROPDAT, a.CANCELDAT, a.PERIOD, case when a.DUEDAT is null then 0 when a.canceldat is not null or a.dropdat is not null then 0 else DATEDiFF(d,getdate(),a.DUEDAT) end as validdat FROM RTLessorAVSCust a inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyLine b on a.COMQ1 = b.COMQ1 and a.LINEQ1 = b.LINEQ1 inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyH c on a.COMQ1 = c.COMQ1 left outer join rtcode e on a.paycycle=e.code and e.kind='M8' left outer join rtcode f on a.paytype=f.code and f.kind='M9' WHERE a.DROPDAT is null and a.CANCELDAT is null and a.FINISHDAT is not null and a.freecode<>'Y' and b.DROPDAT is null and b.CANCELDAT is null

data.name: cmdRT3022.CommandText
data.value: select a.batch, convert(varchar(7), convert(int, convert(varchar(8), dateadd(m, 2, a.duedat), 112)) - 19110000) +';'+ d.csnoticeid + ';' + convert(varchar(3), datepart(yy, a.duedat) - 1911) + substring(convert(varchar(6), a.duedat, 12), 3, 2) + ';' + convert(varchar(9), case b.secondcase when 'Y' then c.amt2 else c.amt end) + ';' + d.cscusid + ';' +' ' + ';' +c.memo + ';' +b.cusnc + ';' as bcodesrc from RTLessorAvsCustBillingPrtSub a inner join RTLessorAvsCust b on a.cusid = b.cusid inner join RTLessorAVSCustBillingBarcode d on d.noticeid = a.noticeid inner join RTBillCharge c on c.casekind = d.casekind and c.paycycle = d.paycycle and c.casetype = '07' where a.batch ='20170201' order by b.comq1, b.lineq1, b.cusnc, c.paycycle

data.name: RT3022.CommandText
data.value: SELECT distinct a.comq1, a.lineq1, a.cusid, convert(varchar(6), a.COMQ1) +'-'+ convert(varchar(2), a.LINEQ1) as comqline, c.comn, a.cusnc, e.codenc, f.codenc, a.CONTACTTEL + case when a.CONTACTTEL <>'' and a.MOBILE <>'' then ' / ' else '' end + a.MOBILE AS TEL, a.APPLYDAT, a.FINISHDAT, a.STRBILLINGDAT, a.newBILLINGDAT, a.adjustday, a.DUEDAT, a.DROPDAT, a.CANCELDAT, a.PERIOD, case when a.DUEDAT is null then 0 when a.canceldat is not null or a.dropdat is not null then 0 else DATEDiFF(d,getdate(),a.DUEDAT) end as validdat,i.codenc FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrt inner join RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtsub on RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrt.batch=RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtsub.batch inner join RTLessorAVSCust a on a.cusid=RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtsub.cusid and a.canceldat is null inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyLine b on a.COMQ1 = b.COMQ1 and a.LINEQ1 = b.LINEQ1 inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyH c on a.COMQ1 = c.COMQ1 left outer join RTLessorAVSCustcont g on g.cusid=RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtsub.cusid left outer join rtcode e on a.paycycle=e.code and e.kind='M8' left outer join rtcode f on a.paytype=f.code and f.kind='M9' left outer join rtcode i on i.code = g.paytype and i.kind ='M9' WHERE a.DROPDAT is null and a.CANCELDAT is null and a.FINISHDAT is not null and a.freecode<>'Y' and b.DROPDAT is null and b.CANCELDAT is null and g.paytype is null and case when a.DUEDAT is null then 0 when a.canceldat is not null or a.dropdat is not null then 0 else DATEDiFF(d,getdate(),a.DUEDAT) end < 0 order by a.comq1,a.lineq1,a.cusnc

data.name: RT3028.CommandText
data.value:
SELECT a.noticeid, a.batch, case c.consignee when '' then '直銷' else '經銷' end as consignee, isnull(k.shortnc, m.cusnc) as shortnc, convert(varchar(5), a.comq1) +'-'+ convert(varchar(2), a.lineq1) as comlineq1, d.comn, b.cusnc, a.duedat, b.contacttel + case when b.contacttel<>'' and b.mobile<>'' then '
' else '' end + b.mobile as tel, isnull(e.cutnc,'')+b.township3+b.raddr3 as raddr, b.dropdat, b.strbillingdat, b.newbillingdat, h.codenc, g.codenc, j.codenc , A.CUSID FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtSub a inner join RTLessorAVSCust b on a.comq1 = b.comq1 and a.lineq1 = b.lineq1 and a.cusid = b.cusid inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyLine c on c.comq1 = b.comq1 and c.lineq1 = b.lineq1 inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyH d on d.comq1 = c.comq1 left outer join RTCounty e on e.cutid = b.cutid3 left outer join RTCode g on g.code = a.paycycle and g.kind ='M8' left outer join RTCode h on h.code = a.casekind and h.kind ='O9' left outer join RTLessorAVSCustCont i on i.cusid = a.cusid and i.canceldat is null and i.strbillingdat = dateadd(d, 1, a.duedat) left outer join rtcode j on j.code = i.paytype and j.kind ='M9' left outer join RTObj k on k.cusid = c.consignee left outer join RTEmployee l inner join RTObj m on m.cusid = l.cusid on l.emply = c.salesid WHERE b.freecode <>'Y' ORDER BY b.duedat desc

data.name: RT302R.CommandText
data.value: SELECT b.cusnc, b.cusnc + case when len(b.cusnc)>4 then ' 您好！' else ' 先生/女士您好！' end as mydear, a.duedat,d.comn, b.applydat, b.birthday, b.contacttel, b.mobile, b.socialid, b.email, g.codenc, b.rzone3, dateadd(d,1, a.duedat) as newBillingDat,case b.casekind when '01' then '2. 經濟型 □季繳(1,197元) □半年繳(2,100元) □年繳(4,000元)' when '02' then '2. 專業型 □季繳(1,410元) □半年繳(2,700元) □年繳(4,800元)' else '' end as payselect, '□' + h.codenc + ' -- ' + g.codenc+'('+ convert(varchar(6), b.rcvmoney) +'元)' as casepay, isnull(e.cutnc, '')+ b.township2+b.raddr2 as addr2, isnull(f.cutnc, '')+ b.township3+b.raddr3 as addr3, a.cusid FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtSub a inner join RTLessorAVSCust b on a.comq1 = b.comq1 and a.lineq1 = b.lineq1 and a.cusid = b.cusid inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyLine c on b.comq1 = c.comq1 and b.lineq1 = c.lineq1 inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyH d on d.comq1 = c.comq1 left outer join RTCounty e on e.cutid = b.cutid2 left outer join RTCounty f on f.cutid = b.cutid3 left outer join RTCode g on g.code = b.paycycle and g.kind ='M8' left outer join RTCode h on h.code = b.casekind and h.kind ='O9' WHERE b.freecode<>'Y' order by A.CUSID

data.name: RT3021R.CommandText
data.value: SELECT BATCH, b.cusnc, b.cusnc + case when len(b.cusnc)>4 then ' 您好！' else ' 先生/女士您好！' end as mydear, a.duedat, d.comn, b.applydat, b.birthday, b.contacttel + ' / ' + b.mobile as contacttel , b.mobile, b.socialid, b.email, g.codenc, b.rzone3, dateadd(d,1, a.duedat) as newBillingDat , isnull(e.cutnc, '')+ b.township2+b.raddr2 as addr2 , isnull(f.cutnc, '')+ b.township3+b.raddr3 as addr3 , I.CASEPAYD AS P01, I.CSBARCOD1 AS COD11, I.CSBARCOD2 AS COD12, I.CSBARCOD3 AS COD13, dateadd(M, I.QT_MON, a.duedat) AS D1 , I.CSNOTICEID AS CSNOTICEID01, I.CSCUSID AS CSCUSID01, I.QT_MON AS Q1 , J.CASEPAYD AS P02, J.CSBARCOD1 AS COD21, J.CSBARCOD2 AS COD22, J.CSBARCOD3 AS COD23, dateadd(M, J.QT_MON, a.duedat) AS D2 , J.CSNOTICEID AS CSNOTICEID02, J.CSCUSID AS CSCUSID02, J.QT_MON AS Q2 , K.CASEPAYD AS P03, K.CSBARCOD1 AS COD31, K.CSBARCOD2 AS COD32, K.CSBARCOD3 AS COD33, dateadd(M, K.QT_MON, a.duedat) AS D3 , K.CSNOTICEID AS CSNOTICEID03, K.CSCUSID AS CSCUSID03, K.QT_MON AS Q3, A.NOTICEID, A.CUSID FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtSub a inner join RTLessorAVSCust b on a.comq1 = b.comq1 and a.lineq1 = b.lineq1 and a.cusid = b.cusid inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyLine c on b.comq1 = c.comq1 and b.lineq1 = c.lineq1 inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyH d on d.comq1 = c.comq1 left outer join RTCounty e on e.cutid = b.cutid2 left outer join RTCounty f on f.cutid = b.cutid3 left outer join RTCode g on g.code = b.paycycle and g.kind ='M8' left outer join RTCode h on h.code = b.casekind and h.kind ='O9' left outer join V_BARCODE I on i.NOTICEID=a.NOTICEID AND I.ITEMNO=1 left outer join V_BARCODE J on J.NOTICEID=a.NOTICEID AND J.ITEMNO=2 left outer join V_BARCODE K on K.NOTICEID=a.NOTICEID AND K.ITEMNO=3 WHERE b.freecode<>'Y' order by b.CUSID

data.name: RT3023.CommandText
data.value: SELECT C.BATCH, C.BATCH+'續約繳費' AS '代收費用別', CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), SUBSTRING(C.BATCH, 1,4)-1911) +SUBSTRING(C.BATCH,5, 2) AS '期別' , RIGHT(A.CSNOTICEID, 4) AS '客戶編號', D.CUSNC AS '姓名', '' AS '郵遞區號', '' AS '地址' , CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), C.DUEDAT, 111), 1,4)-1911) +SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), C.DUEDAT, 111),5,6) AS '繳費期限' , CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), C.DUEDAT, 111), 1,4)-1911) +SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), C.DUEDAT, 111),5,6) AS '超商代收期限' , B.AMT AS '網路費' FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingBarcode A left join RTBillCharge b on b.CASETYPE='07' AND B.CASEKIND=A.CASEKIND AND B.PAYCYCLE=A.PAYCYCLE LEFT JOIN RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtSub C ON C.NOTICEID=A.NOTICEID LEFT JOIN RTLessorAVSCust D ON D.CUSID=C.CUSID

data.name: cmdRT302R.CommandText
data.value: SELECT A.BATCH, b.cusnc, b.cusnc + case when len(b.cusnc)>4 then ' 您好！' else ' 先生/女士您好！' end as mydear, a.duedat,d.comn, b.applydat, b.birthday, b.contacttel, b.mobile, b.socialid, b.email, g.codenc, b.rzone3, dateadd(d,1, a.duedat) as newBillingDat,case b.casekind when '01' then '2. 經濟型 □季繳(1,197元) □半年繳(2,100元) □年繳(4,000元)' when '02' then '2. 專業型 □季繳(1,410元) □半年繳(2,700元) □年繳(4,800元)' else '' end as payselect, '□' + h.codenc + ' -- ' + g.codenc+'('+ convert(varchar(6), b.rcvmoney) +'元)' as casepay, b.raddr2 as addr2, b.raddr3 as addr3, a.cusid FROM RTLessorAVSCustBillingPrtSub a inner join RTLessorAVSCust b on a.comq1 = b.comq1 and a.lineq1 = b.lineq1 and a.cusid = b.cusid inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyLine c on b.comq1 = c.comq1 and b.lineq1 = c.lineq1 inner join RTLessorAVSCmtyH d on d.comq1 = c.comq1 left outer join RTCounty e on e.cutid = b.cutid2 left outer join RTCounty f on f.cutid = b.cutid3 left outer join RTCode g on g.code = b.paycycle and g.kind ='M8' left outer join RTCode h on h.code = b.casekind and h.kind ='O9' WHERE b.freecode<>'Y' order by A.CUSID
